description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A top-down shooter with a time-stopping twist. Use your time powers to escape sticky situtations and rack up a huge score multiplier.
description.short: A top-down shooter with a time-stopping twist. Use your time powers to escape sticky situtations and rack up a huge score multiplier.
